programs.show_description: S1 Ep2 - ''Fast Money'' is America's post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, ''Fast Money'' breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news.
S1 Ep6 - Squawk Box Asia is CNBC's flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and the opening of Asia's business trading day.
